channel.title: Vibecast: Morning Vibe
channel.description: A short daily podcast with weather, inspiring stories, and a reason to get excited about today.
channel.itunes:author: Dominic
channel.itunes:summary: A short daily podcast with weather, inspiring stories, and a reason to get excited about today.

item.title: Morning Vibe — December 17, 2025
item.description:
Good news to fuel your day for December 17, 2025.
Duration: ~5 minutes
IN THIS EPISODE:
1. NASA Launches Research Program for Students to Explore Big Ideas Source: NASA Breaking News 2. Through Astronaut Eyes: 25 Years of Life in Orbit Source: NASA Breaking News 3. NASA, Partners Share First Data From New US-European Sea Satellite Source: NASA JPL News 4. Nothing fans contribute to retro-tinged Phone (3a) Community Edition Source: Dezeen 5. Nothing’s New Phone (3a) Was Designed by Its Future Users Source: Design Milk 6. A season of solidarity: eight projects empowering people this Christmas Source: Positive News
REFERENCES:
1. NASA Launches Research Program for Students to Explore Big Ideas https://www.nasa.gov/learning-resources/research-program-for-students/
2. Through Astronaut Eyes: 25 Years of Life in Orbit https://www.nasa.gov/centers-and-facilities/johnson/through-astronaut-eyes-25-years-of-life-in-orbit/
3. NASA, Partners Share First Data From New US-European Sea Satellite https://www.jpl.nasa.gov/news/nasa-partners-share-first-data-from-new-us-european-sea-satellite
4. Nothing fans contribute to retro-tinged Phone (3a) Community Edition https://www.dezeen.com/2025/12/16/nothing-phone-3a-community-edition-design/
5. Nothing’s New Phone (3a) Was Designed by Its Future Users https://design-milk.com/nothings-new-phone-3a-was-designed-by-its-future-users/
6. A season of solidarity: eight projects empowering people this Christmas https://www.positive.news/society/a-season-of-solidarity-8-grassroots-ideas-powering-christmas-2025/

item.title: Morning Vibe — December 16, 2025
item.description:
Good news to fuel your day for December 16, 2025.
Duration: ~5 minutes
IN THIS EPISODE:
1. Ten years Source: OpenAI News 2. Strengthening cyber resilience as AI capabilities advance Source: OpenAI News 3. Anti-Defamation League says anger at Israel is now the driving force behind antisemitism in the U.S. Source: NY1 Politics 4. ‘I found my people’: Frank Turner on saving Britain’s grassroots music venues Source: Positive News 5. How to avoid plastic tat killing the Christmas buzz Source: Positive News 6. CNN Hero of the Year Turns Vacant Lots on Chicago’s South Side into Flower Farms Source: Good News Network
REFERENCES:
1. Ten years https://openai.com/index/ten-years
2. Strengthening cyber resilience as AI capabilities advance https://openai.com/index/strengthening-cyber-resilience
3. Anti-Defamation League says anger at Israel is now the driving force behind antisemitism in the U.S. http://www.ny1.com/nyc/all-boroughs/politics/2025/04/22/anti-defamation-league-says-anger-at-israel-is-now-the-driving-force-behind-antisemitism-in-the-u-s-
4. ‘I found my people’: Frank Turner on saving Britain’s grassroots music venues https://www.positive.news/society/i-found-my-people-frank-turner-on-saving-britains-grassroots-music-venues/
5. How to avoid plastic tat killing the Christmas buzz https://www.positive.news/society/christmas-presents-how-to-avoid-plastic-tat-killing-the-buzz/
6. CNN Hero of the Year Turns Vacant Lots on Chicago’s South Side into Flower Farms https://www.goodnewsnetwork.org/the-2025-cnn-hero-of-the-year-transforms-vacant-lots-on-chicagos-south-side-into-flower-farms/

item.title: Morning Vibe — December 15, 2025
item.description:
Good news to fuel your day for December 15, 2025.
Duration: ~3 minutes
IN THIS EPISODE:
1. 30,000 Animals Rescued from Illegal Captivity in the Largest Wildlife Trafficking Raid in History Source: Good News Network 2. Breaking boundaries: the headsets bringing cricket to partially sighted fans Source: Positive News 3. Good News in History, December 15 Source: Good News Network 4. BNY builds “AI for everyone, everywhere” with OpenAI Source: OpenAI News 5. How We Used Codex to Ship Sora for Android in 28 Days Source: OpenAI News 6. The AI-Bubble – Slow hiss or big bang? Source: Hacker News (AI filtered)
REFERENCES:
1. 30,000 Animals Rescued from Illegal Captivity in the Largest Wildlife Trafficking Raid in History https://www.goodnewsnetwork.org/30000-animals-rescued-from-illegal-captivity-in-the-largest-wildlife-trafficking-raid-in-history/
2. Breaking boundaries: the headsets bringing cricket to partially sighted fans https://www.positive.news/lifestyle/sport/tech-opens-cricket-to-blind-and-partially-sighted-fans/
3. Good News in History, December 15 https://www.goodnewsnetwork.org/events061215/
4. BNY builds “AI for everyone, everywhere” with OpenAI https://openai.com/index/bny
5. How We Used Codex to Ship Sora for Android in 28 Days https://openai.com/index/shipping-sora-for-android-with-codex
6. The AI-Bubble – Slow hiss or big bang? https://its.promp.td/the-ai-bubble-slow-hiss-or-big-bang/

item.title: Morning Sunshine — December 14, 2025
item.description:
Your daily dose of good news and good vibes for December 14, 2025.
Duration: ~3 minutes
IN THIS EPISODE:
1. Good News in History, December 14 Source: Good News Network 2. Photographer Captures Incredible Luminous Event Over His Italian Town–For the Second Time (LOOK) Source: Good News Network 3. What went right this week: the good news that matters Source: Positive News 4. Abandoned oil refineries are becoming unlikely havens for wildlife Source: Positive News 5. NASA Astronaut Jonny Kim to Discuss Eight-Month Space Station Mission Source: NASA 6. NASA’s Webb, Curiosity Named in TIME’s Best Inventions Hall of Fame Source: NASA
REFERENCES:
1. Good News in History, December 14 https://www.goodnewsnetwork.org/events061214/
2. Photographer Captures Incredible Luminous Event Over His Italian Town–For the Second Time (LOOK) https://www.goodnewsnetwork.org/photographer-captures-incredible-luminous-event-over-his-town-for-2nd-time/
3. What went right this week: the good news that matters https://www.positive.news/society/good-news-stories-from-week-50-of-2025/
4. Abandoned oil refineries are becoming unlikely havens for wildlife https://www.positive.news/environment/abandoned-oil-refineries-are-becoming-unlikely-havens-for-wildlife/
5. NASA Astronaut Jonny Kim to Discuss Eight-Month Space Station Mission https://www.nasa.gov/news-release/nasa-astronaut-jonny-kim-to-discuss-eight-month-space-station-mission/
6. NASA’s Webb, Curiosity Named in TIME’s Best Inventions Hall of Fame https://science.nasa.gov/missions/webb/nasas-webb-curiosity-named-in-times-best-inventions-hall-of-fame/
